title: Fun chilled players wanted for team
body:
Sup Board

Long time player (from s3 I believe), decently skilked but never bothered to climb ladder due to only being able to really play on weekends.

Very chilled guy, looking for similar people to start a team, win or lose you must be in it for the fun and no flaming teammates. Of course defintely play to win too.

But remember this would be a super casual team as im only on for maybe about 2-3 days a week. Located in Syd for time zone considerations.

I main adc champions (but play all lanes, eg quinn top). Look forwards to some teammate! (pref lower ranked so we can learn together!)

replies.body: Do you guys have a teamspeak server for league players OCE?

Ayyyy  I main support (i can play all lanes except middle) Im bronze 2, I have good experience with Ranked teams Since I was on a team called TeamSoloDiagonal, I main alistar as support, My best kda with alistar was 0/1/21, I play too win and have fun!, From 1 to 10 (1 being good and 10 being bad) my toxicity/flame Is 2 or 3. IGN: Slayer1999
add u tonite where r u.located?

I live in Sydney too, lvl29 sooo close to 30 and would love to learn more about the game! I may not be amazing skilled but would never rage at a teammate, could I join?:D

Btw I main mid, Ahri, Lux and annie, can't play other champs very well but of course as always I'm looking to learn new champs when new free rotations come:)
located on the Gold Coast, I only can play after 10pm usually due to my work. Never flame or being toxic to others and never afk a game. Add me if you are still interested.
will do bro - though wehave time difference and being on that late means probably wont catch u much haha
add u tonite where r u.located?
add u tonite where r u.located?
k will add u all tonite, keep posting ppl :)
I mainly play as assassin Mage or melee and am looking for a team of you want to hit me up. I'm EUW
